title: Service Fabric .NET SDK Repositories
body:
Service Fabric .NET SDK repositories:

**Reliable Services and Actors:**
https://github.com/Azure/service-fabric-services-and-actors-dotnet
- Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services
- Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting
- Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors
- Reliable Collections framework

**ASP.NET Core Integration:**
https://github.com/Azure/service-fabric-aspnetcore
- Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.AspNetCore.*
- Web API and MVC integration
- Kestrel and HTTP.sys support

These repositories contain the core programming models for building stateful and stateless services in Service Fabric using .NET.
